sentences.en: But the general aspect of the swamp was malignant.
sentences.cn: 但是,这片沼泽地总的来看是其貌不善的.

sentences.en: Ditches were dug to drain water from the swamp.
Elephants were often to be found in swamp in eastern Kenya around the Tana River.
sentences.cn: 在肯尼亚东部的塔纳河一带经常发现陷入沼泽的大象。

sentences.en: I spent one whole night by a swamp behind the road listening to frogs.
sentences.cn: 我整个晚上都在这条路后面的一个沼泽地旁听蛙鸣。

sentences.en: In the swamp the army was beset by mosquitoes.
sentences.cn: 在沼泽地,该军受到蚊子的困扰.

sentences.en: In the swamp we were beset by mosquitoes.
sentences.cn: 在沼泽地里,我们受到蚊子的围攻.

sentences.en: Myriads of mosquitoes from the swamp invaded our village every twilight.
sentences.cn: 每天黄昏无数蚊虫从沼泽地飞来侵袭我们的村子.

sentences.en: Temperatures in this swamp environment apparently can be cool but not frigid.
sentences.cn: 在沼泽环境中的气候显然是凉爽的而不是寒冷的.

sentences.en: The fort flanked on a swamp.
The soldiers became bogged in the swamp.

sentences.cn: 这片沼泽地蚊子多极了.

sentences.en: The water in the swamp is foul.
Their electronic navigation failed and a rogue wave swamped the boat.
sentences.cn: 他们的电子导航装置失灵了，一个巨浪吞没了那只船。

sentences.en: There was yet hope in that southern swamp of despair and violence.
sentences.cn: 南方那一片暴虐横行、肆无忌惮的烂泥塘,也还有前途可盼.

sentences.en: They drained the swamp and turned it into fertile land.
sentences.cn: 他们排去沼泽地的水,将它变成了肥沃的土地.

sentences.en: This is a crocodile - infested swamp.
sentences.cn: 这是一片鳄鱼聚居的沼泽地.

sentences.en: We can only get farther and farther into the swamp of awkwardness.
sentences.cn: 我们只会越来越陷入僵局,找不到出路.

words.tran_cn: 沼泽的；湿地的；沼泽多的；松软的
下沉；陷入沼泽；陷入困境；不知所措（过去式swamped，过去分词swamped，现在分词swamping，第三人称单数swamps，名词swampiness，形容词swampy）

trans.tran_en: land that is always very wet or covered with a layer of water

trans.tran_cn: 使陷于沼泽；使沉没；使陷入困境
trans.tran_en: If something swamps a place or object, it fills it with water

trans.tran_cn: 淹没，使沉没，使陷入困难，忙得不可开交
trans.tran_en: to suddenly cover an area with a lot of water
